page.title: 11Tourism in Morecambe.
page.content:
A description of Morecambe Promenade
If it is a fine night and you come down street you will come out on the promenade and you will see a beautiful sunset going down over the hills of the Lake Distrct. "All the ones, legs eleven," and you will hear the noisy clatter of money coming out of slot machines. People walk along looking into shops and stuffing candy-floss into their mouthes. At the edge of the Promenade you can hear the swish of the sea and across the water you can see fishermen working on their boats and seabirds following behind them, trying to catch the fish in the fishermen's nets. At the end of the season the illuminations are on and the lights reflect in the sea.
